mapper.insert: insert into pms2_team(name, dscrt, max_qty, sdt, edt) values(#{name},#{description},#{maxQty},#{startDate},#{endDate})
mapper.select: select name, dscrt, max_qty, sdt, edt from pms2_team where name=#{name}

select t.name, t.dscrt, t.max_qty, t.sdt, t.edt, tm.mid, m.email from pms2_team t left outer join pms2_team_member tm on t.name=tm.tnm left outer join pms2_member m on tm.mid=m.mid where t.name=#{value}
